frontmatter.title: Fusion Software
frontmatter.description: IBM Fusion software provides resilient data services, wherever Red Hat OpenShift runs.

internal.content:
---
title: Fusion Software
description: IBM Fusion software provides resilient data services, wherever Red Hat OpenShift runs.
tabs: [Overview, Resources]
---

import { AgilityWithHybridMulticloud, Building, ContainerMicroservices, DisasterRecovery, HybridCloudInfrastructure, InfrastructureSecurity, ManagedHosting_02, Storage, Workflows } from '@carbon/pictograms-react';

<PageDescription>

Consistent data services wherever OpenShift runs - public cloud, bare metal, Z, Power, or VMware.

</PageDescription>

<AnchorLinks>
  <AnchorLink
    to="overview#highly-available-block-file-and-object-storage-consistently-wherever-openshift-runs."
    >
    Storage
  </AnchorLink>
  <AnchorLink
    to="overview#protect-applications-from-data-loss-or-corruption-with-enterprise-grade-backuprestore."
    >
    Backup and recovery
  </AnchorLink>
  <AnchorLink
    to="overview#protect-applications-from-the-loss-of-an-availability-zone-or-region."
    >
    Disaster recovery
  </AnchorLink>
</AnchorLinks>

## Highly available block, file, and object storage - consistently, wherever OpenShift runs.

<Row className="square-card-group">
  <SquareCard
    title="All of the storage your applications need"
    actionIcon=""
    bodyText="Highly available block, file, and object storage."
    >
    <Storage aria-label="Storage" className="my-custom-class" />
  </SquareCard>

  <SquareCard
    title="Write once, deploy anywhere"
    href="/storage/consistent-storage"
    bodyText="Consistently consume storage regardless of where your cluster is hosted."
    >
    <HybridCloudInfrastructure aria-label="Hybrid cloud storage" className="my-custom-class" />
  </SquareCard>
  <SquareCard
    title="Secure"
    actionIcon=""
    bodyText="Encrypt data at rest."
     >
     <InfrastructureSecurity aria-label="Encrypted storage" className="my-custom-class" />
  </SquareCard>
</Row>

## Protect applications from data loss or corruption with enterprise grade backup/restore.
<Row className="square-card-group">
  <SquareCard
    title="Built for container workloads"
    actionIcon="launch"
    href="https://community.ibm.com/community/user/storage/blogs/jc-lopez/2023/06/07/ibm-storage-fusion-backup-as-code?CommunityKey=e596ba82-cd57-4fae-8042-163e59279ff3"
    bodyText="'Backup as code' makes it trivial to assign policies to applications across a multi-cluster environment"
    >
    <ContainerMicroservices aria-label="Containers" className="my-custom-class" />
  </SquareCard>

  <SquareCard
    title="Orchestrated backup and recovery"
    actionIcon="launch"
    href="https://community.ibm.com/community/user/storage/blogs/jim-smith/2023/07/27/ibm-storage-fusion-backup-restore-recipe-1?CommunityKey=e596ba82-cd57-4fae-8042-163e59279ff3"
    bodyText="Backup even the most complex applications using the power of Recipes.  Explore the git repository."
    >
    <Workflows aria-label="Resiliency" className="my-custom-class" />
  </SquareCard>

  <SquareCard
    title="Hub and spoke architecture"
    actionIcon="launch"
    href="https://www.ibm.com/docs/en/storage-fusion-software/2.7.x?topic=restore-hub-spoke-model-overview"
    bodyText="Trivially restore an application to another cluster."
     >
     <ManagedHosting_02 aria-label="Hub and spoke" className="my-custom-class" />
  </SquareCard>
</Row>

## Protect applications from the loss of an availability zone or region.
<Row className="square-card-group">
  <SquareCard
    title="Metro disaster recovery"
    actionIcon="launch"
    href="https://www.ibm.com/docs/en/storage-fusion-software/2.7.x?topic=414-configuring-data-foundation-disaster-recovery"
    bodyText="Synchronous replication protects applications from the loss of an availability zone."
    >
    <Building aria-label="Metro DR" className="my-custom-class" />
  </SquareCard>

  <SquareCard
    title="Regional disaster recovery"
    actionIcon="launch"
    href="https://www.ibm.com/docs/en/storage-fusion-software/2.7.x?topic=recovery-regional-dr-solution-fusion-data-foundation"
    bodyText="Asynchronous replication at a distance protects applications from the loss of a region."
    >
    <AgilityWithHybridMulticloud aria-label="Regional DR" className="my-custom-class" />
  </SquareCard>

  <SquareCard
    title="Fully orchestrated"
    actionIcon="launch"
    href="https://www.ibm.com/docs/en/storage-fusion-software/2.7.x?topic=mdsfdf-create-sample-application-testing-disaster-recovery-solution"
    bodyText="Fusion doesn't just mirror data.  It orchestrates the complete deployment of applications during recovery at the other site."
     >
     <DisasterRecovery aria-label="Orchestrated recovery" className="my-custom-class" />
  </SquareCard>
</Row>
